tool_description: Identifies the physical location of components related to diagnostic trouble codes for repair accessibility assessment.

dtc_codes.description: Diagnostic codes to locate associated components

engine_type.description: Engine specification (4cyl, v6, v8, diesel, hybrid)

error_messages: Vehicle not found: Make, model, and year combination not in component database.
Invalid DTC format: Diagnostic codes must follow standard OBD format.
Component mapping unavailable: Physical locations not available for one or more codes.
Engine type mismatch: Specified engine type not available for this vehicle model/year.
usage: Provide DTC codes and complete vehicle identification. Tool returns physical component locations and accessibility information for repair planning.

component_names.description: Names of components associated with each DTC

locations.description: Physical locations of components in vehicle

access_difficulty.description: Repair accessibility rating (easy, moderate, difficult, specialist)

required_tools.description: Basic tools needed to access each component
